enable() - Static method in class sam.console.ANSI
 
enable_line_wrap() - Static method in class sam.console.VT100
Text wraps to next line if longer than the length of the display area.
enable_screen_scroll() - Static method in class sam.console.VT100
Enable scrolling for entire display.
ENCIRCLED - Static variable in class sam.console.ANSI
52 Encircled
erase_down() - Static method in class sam.console.VT100
Erases the screen from the current line down to the bottom of the screen.
erase_end_of_line() - Static method in class sam.console.VT100
Erases from the current cursor position to the end of the current line.
erase_line() - Static method in class sam.console.VT100
Erases the entire current line.
erase_screen() - Static method in class sam.console.VT100
Erases the screen with the background colour and moves the cursor to home.
erase_start_of_line() - Static method in class sam.console.VT100
Erases from the current cursor position to the start of the current line.
erase_up() - Static method in class sam.console.VT100
Erases the screen from the current line up to the top of the screen.
